Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: Wait for WIndows 2016 docker complete support and update pipelines
Issue.description: As of now we user virtualenv to run test on Windows 2016 (like on Windows 2012). It's because unlike Windows 10 Windows 2016 does not support linux docker images. Wait for the proper docker support on WIndows 2016 and update test pipelines to use docker for testing.
